name: Zompocalypse (itch) (TheBadVirus)
description:
Created for the My First Game Jam: Summer 2022

A fast-paced twin-stick-shooter where you have to fight off hordes of zombies, and pickup medkits to increase your health.

Controls:

Mouse and Keyboard:

Movement with WASD or Arrow Keys
Aim with Mouse and Shoot with Left Mouse
Pause Game with ESC
Toggle Fullscreen with F11
Menu Controls with WASD, Arrow Keys or Mouse

Xbox-Controller:

Movement with Left Stick
Aim with Right Stick and Shoot with RT
Pause Game with Start
Toggle Fullscreen with RB
Menu Controls with D-Pad

Other Controllers might have different keybinds or not work at all.

After using the Controller, the Keyboard and Mouse Controls are deactivated!!!

Linux Build is untested!!!
